How many people are affected by Bartter syndrome ?,"The exact prevalence of this disorder is unknown, although it likely affects about 1 per million people worldwide. The condition appears to be more common in Costa Rica and Kuwait than in other populations.",GHR,Bartter syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Bartter syndrome ?,"Bartter syndrome can be caused by mutations in at least five genes. Mutations in the SLC12A1 gene cause type I. Type II res
